name: Unending Dusk
description: Unending Dusk is a retro inspired beat ‘em up set in a post-apocalyptic world. Play solo or with up to 4 players and brawl your way through hordes of enemies. You play as an elite mercenary who fights against a dark force that has locked the Earth in a state of unending dusk.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or Later Processor: Intel Core™ Duo or faster Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant video card Storage: 750 MB available space Additional Notes: Gamepad highly recommended.
